name: Block Breaker (leoeternal)
description:
Block Breaker is an  addictive gameplay, and challenges your brain simply drag the paddle to bounce balls and break bricks.

Your objective is to break all the color bricks and as you progress gameplay becomes harder and more all you need to do is break bricks.
very simple destroy all the bricks to pass the levels and enjoy.
Some Bricks are breakable and some are unbreakable.
Block Breaker is a super-fun game board that will keep you busy for hours!

So what are you waiting for? Play Block Breaker Game for free and complete all the 4 Levels.
